publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4197 Stewart Stevenson: The Draft Planning etc. (Scotland) Act 2006 (Consequential Amendments) Order 2009—That the Local Government and Communities Committee recommends that the draft Planning etc. (Scotland) Act 2006 (Consequential Amendments) Order 2009 be approved. Supported by: John Swinney*

S3M-4197 Stewart Stevenson: The Draft Planning etc. (Scotland) Act 2006 (Consequential Amendments) Order 2009—That the Local Government and Communities Committee recommends that the draft Planning etc. (Scotland) Act 2006 (Consequential Amendments) Order 2009 be approved. Supported by: John Swinney
